name: Dungeons And Dating (Pizzaorpie)
description:
SO Here's the deal.

We were very ambitious with this project and flew WAY too close to the sun.

So in it's current state it is barely playable, but we spent 48 hours making it so we're gonna release what we have damn it! Just have a fair warning that you have stepping into a glitchy mess.

That being said, this is totally something we're gonna work on after the jam so let us know if you'd be interested in that! :)

-Here's who did it-

Coding: Pizzaorpie(ME)
Music & SFX: Andrew Swisher and Lorien Donovan(SmolMomoArt@Instagram)
Script: Max Moreno and Lorien Donovan(SmolMomoArt@Instagram)
Character Arts: Max Moreno
Background Art: Jackson Breman, Andrew Swisher, and Lorien Donovan(SmolMomoArt@Instagram)

-The Plot-

You, Ori, have fallen for a girl name Mina and have formed a link with her. 
Try keeping a good relationship with her while fighting off the evil cult threat inflicting the town of FOVE. 

-Gameplay-

Dating sim mix with RPG.  You don't control your ally to try and get that feeling on a companion in there. Sadly in this version the relationship bar doesn't mean anything, but you can get up to 3 full chains so go for it if you want!
